data.text: Ready for the beach this summer? Jump into Gwanganli Beach in Pusan, South Korea! #traveltuesday #beach #summer http://t.co/kZwRU1Xp6j
New York, I love you! Wouldn't it be grand to lay out in the sun in Central Park? Thanks to @gopaldivan for the pic! http://t.co/L8iL1iQ48D
@JaemiSuh ...agent where your purchase was made for further info. Thank you!
@JaemiSuh Hello! This would depend on where you purchased your ticket, and seat availability on the new dates. Please contact the travel...
RT @GlobalTravelCpl: @AsianaAirlines my wife and I were discussing Biz classes.  We feel #asianaairlines is the best product & service for …
What would you give to be in the beautiful waters of Phuket this weekend? #travel #flyasiana #thailand #phuket http://t.co/W1qUnlyebP
Have you ever come face-to-face with a statue in Siem Reap, Cambodia? #travel #flyasiana… http://t.co/6FrNNxpryX
Congrats to @Nevetsah! You've been selected to win the Hyun-Jin Ryu autographed ball and aircraft model! Thanks for being a fan! :)
RT @PIERPAOLOMONNI: @AsianaAirlines Amazing Camelia to wish everyone a Happy National Water A Flower Day! #wateraflower http://t.co/cThEYX0…
@scubaseansa Thank you! :) We're glad to hear that your experience was a good one. See you on-board again soon?
@soomp @soompi You received them! Thank YOU for your awesomeness! :)
@BrosephIsrael Why thank you! We definitely try our best to be hospitable to our passengers. :)
Happy National Water A Flower Day! #wateraflower Do you have flowers in a vase with you? Tweet us photos if you do! http://t.co/DSp2ce2VBo
Fly w/ #AsianaAirlines to Thailand and visit the Wat Phrakaew, a.k.a. Emerald Buddha Temple. #thailand #travel http://t.co/XY3UWshxKA
Have you held the sunset in your hands? In Gangwondo, the sun sets in between these palms. #travel #flyASIANA http://t.co/GVHfWb2BN7
Hyun-Jin Ryu @Dodgers threw his 1st shut-out last night & we've got another signed ball & aircraft model! http://t.co/Dz2CjGQEVD RT to win!
@HaikoHeilemann Thank you! That just made our day. :)
RT @HaikoHeilemann: Every time I look into your smiling faces it makes me smile too. Thx @AsianaAirlines
@nafis_agsa That's a rad collage of our airline photos! Did you know that is our old company logo?
@HarrisCharles5 Thank you! We hope your flight was pleasant! Make sure to tweet us the next time you fly! :)
@DaleKamp Good to hear you booked them with us! :) Where did you catch this model aircraft?
We're in a New York state of mind as July 22nd is drawing near. #OZFirstSuite #AsianaAirlines #Travel #travelTuesday http://t.co/O0S3blAlYq
San Francisco is one of six US gateways for #AsianaAirlines... Anyone know which famous American tv… http://t.co/jDP860hq5e
It's the weekend... Wouldn't you just want to lay back and relax? #travel #flyASIANA #OZFirstSuite… http://t.co/1c474FdeYj
We dream of flying every night. The sky is where we'd rather be! Agree? #fly #travel #asianaairlines… http://t.co/RbtiECYHWu
B747 lift-off! Where do you want to escape to this #MemorialDay weekend? #travel #flyasiana… http://t.co/9JWjy9sILk
The OZ First Suite is coming your way to JFK starting July 22nd! Are you ready for the 32-inch… http://t.co/hgcY25kF4b
TGIF! It's a long weekend for some of us in the US. Where will you go on #MemorialDay? Will you be flying with us?
@thinisin1333 Thanks for the shout-out!
We've launched our official Instagram! Hope to see you there! >>> @asianaairlines <<<
"We wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfillment." #travelquotes #travel #flyasiana… http://t.co/WdNOXtFFs4
@mhrsd3 We definitely recommend the Golden Gate Bridge, Pier 39, and ride the trolley! There are many museums and exhibits too!
@bomirillas Yes? How can we help you?
@SABbodytolove Will you be flying with us? :)
@Korea_snow Thanks for the acknowledgement! :)
@KaliMakki We're happy to have you back on board with us! :) Make sure you tweet us photos!
Today was the kick-off of daily flights between SEATTLE and SEOUL! Were you on this flight? :) #flyASIANA http://t.co/RRHCrEhSM3
Thanks to everyone who participated. Keep up with us for more chances to win Hyun-Jin Ryu and Shin-Soo Choo signed baseballs! :)
Congrats @respondandreact! You've been selected to win a @HyunJinRyu99 autographed baseball! Please follow us so that we may send you a DM!
Namdaemun,set on fire back 2008, has been newly restored after five years! #travel Read more: http://t.co/dGIG69Xmmf http://t.co/lHY7yZNtCm
@JavaWithJae Giving you a heads up that we've posted our ball giveaway tweet. ;)
@geoSteven Thanks for that! Looks like you're on top of our game! ;)
Hyun-Jin Ryu takes another win for the Dodgers today! RT to win an autographed ball! Congrats @HyunJinRyu99
ASIANA installs 40 solar-powered streetlamps in Central Vietnam. #ecofriendly Read more: http://t.co/BMu3P6nBRM http://t.co/0wZyb4dbKd
@JavaWithJae If RYU wins tonight, we'll be posting a tweet within 24 hours and followers will have to RT. Keep on the lookout! :)
Good morning! The @Dodgers Hyun-Jin Ryu will be pitching again today. If #RYU wins, we'll be giving away another autographed ball!
@42nandoah Hello, you are to present your Asiana Club number every time you check in an OZ or Star Alliance flight in order to accrue miles.
@vasujain If you DM us your Asiana Club account number, we'll go ahead and look into the status of your card issuance! Thank you!
Awesome! Congrats and we hope you enjoy your trip! RT @HackMyTrip: We're looking forward to flying with you on our honeymoon this summer!
SEATTLE! It's almost here! Starting May 23, we're going daily to Incheon! #travel #flyASIANA http://t.co/YUEDhXddlz
RT @steputrip: Pleased with @AsianaAirlines so far, no line checking in, took care of my bags, friendly service so far. #flyingtophilippine…
@bigbravehearts We certainly think Asiana Airlines would be a good choice! :)
@laurelM_Ed Good to hear that you enjoyed your meals! :) Thanks for flying with us!
@yaknowitsmelo It's not quite an anniversary...
@Bjbrunner We just celebrated our 25th on February 17th...
Can anyone guess why this Thursday, May 23rd is a special day for us? We've mentioned it a few times... Any takers? :)
Good morning and happy Monday! Won't you jump on board with us this week? #flyASIANA #airplane #travel http://t.co/knhZ2GjafT
@AirlineLoop Thank you! We're flattered you think so! :)
When I see an Asiana airplane, I think about __________.... #flyasiana #travel #dreaming http://t.co/pDBK0WVYKb
Thanks for sharing! Hope you enjoyed your flight! “@JetSetCD: A sliver of @asianaairlines 1145 GMP - KIX. #travel https://t.co/ZSyDRpaf31”
RT @geoSteven: I'm now following @AsianaAirlines. Why? Because I just won a @Reds OF Shin-Soo Choo autographed baseball from them. #playball
@geoSteven Please follow us so that we may send you a DM! :) Thank you!
Don't forget, ASIANA supports baseball players HyunJin Ryu and Shinsoo Choo! If the Dodgers or Reds win, we could be giving out a prize!
Congrats, @geoSteven! You've been selected to win a Shinsoo Choo autographed baseball! :) Please check your DM for further info! :)
Enjoy watching Shinsoo Choo hit 2 homeruns this week? We're giving away another autographed baseball! RT for your chance to win! #CHOOCHOO
@JetSetCD Awesome! Where will you be going?
@cooldude_96 Thank you! :)
Good morning! Ready to take a flight out today? Which aircraft would you like to fly on? #Travel #TGIF #flyASIANA http://t.co/oy8vEipi1y
We'll be giving away some goodies at the Irvine Korean Cultural Festival this Saturday! Come out and say HI! http://t.co/AdmEJ4SvW0
We have quite a number of birthdays in our office this month, so we thought we'd share it with our May bday fans! http://t.co/PH96S9dSgj
The signed Hyun-Jin Ryu baseball will go to @bigmalx! Congrats! :) Please check your DM for further info. http://t.co/3ZIVAC6AoN
@harisrudianto This sounds amazing!
See an exclusive video message from PSY! We'd like to wish @psy_oppa all the best doing big things around the globe! http://t.co/G0cNYp9dyO
Ding ding ding!! RT @PointsToPointB: Psy? RT @AsianaAirlines: Can anyone name who the face of ASIANA is? http://t.co/AXtoV4lMi3
Can anyone name who the face of ASIANA is?
@wandering_j The thought of hot sauce with bulgogi is mouthwatering! What an excellent choice!
@frann17frann That's a great choice! We can't reject a good bowl of bibimbap either!
If you could eat whatever meal you can have during a flight with Asiana Airlines, what would you order? #flyASIANA #travel
@simonkissack Have you retweeted our post? Make sure to RT in order to be entered in the drawing! Thank you!
We're giving away a signed Hyun-Jin Ryu baseball. RT if you're a supporter like us for your chance to win! Go #RYU! http://t.co/759wgdub43
Welcome aboard! We hope you enjoy your flight! :) RT @_AGN90: for the first time will use the Asiana Airlines ^____^
Are you ready for lift-off? Thanks for the photo! RT @juanjosalguero: @AsianaAirlines One of my favorite liveries. http://t.co/taXB4fBcQE …
Our favorite Dodger @HyunJinRyu99 plays catch with an adorable kid in the stands! http://t.co/ZZ91LMhPEI We're always cheering for you!
Hope your flight was enjoyable! :)RT @TomSantos03: Its time! See you in twelve hrs LA! :) #AsianaAirlines #LosAngeles http://t.co/cBBIHgcnCZ
Haha! Good thing there's instructions! ;) RT @Tinglay: How do you eat? #asianaairlines #food #foodporn http://t.co/IwWluhuRqx
RT @william82sg: Had #Bibimbap at #AsianaAirlines earlier! Love the #Gochujang sauce mixed w rice, beef & veggies!… http://t.co/8vxk3Enecq
This is a beautiful video! Thanks for sharing! :) RT @SpeedBirdHD: Close up takeoff of Asiana pax jet. http://t.co/rIdW3qyBVF
The 2013 Suncheon Bay Garden Expo showcases the hopes and dreams for the future of Korea. #TravelTuesday #green http://t.co/ooUYgBP3BR
@limhur Thanks for coming on board with us! We're glad you enjoyed your flight! :)
@BurcuKD Hope you enjoyed your flight with us! :)
@phnrob2011 Hello there! Where and how did you win this contest? You'll need to refer to the terms and conditions of this contest. Thanks!
@thechrislowden Hello there, Chris! It's in our plans to bring them in next summer. In the meantime, we hope you enjoy our First Class! :)
@CaptainAboard Happy Monday!
@JoannePnay Good morning! Happy Monday! Thanks for following us! :)
Good morning, Tweeps! Looks like a great way to getaway. What do say to flying out to Asia today? http://t.co/BuU7ugjLDh
@ENNOBLER From there, you should be able to select your dates and route and check availability. Please let us know if you need further help!
@ENNOBLER Hello there! On http://t.co/nGVvAPsntu, are you on "Book Flights" under the Bookings & Offers tab?
How is everyone's Mother's Day going so far? Anyone traveling with mom? Show us your best pictures!
